  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4447</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Emigration and Emigrants</string>
            <string language="es">Emigración y emigrantes</string>
            <string language="ga">Imirce agus Imircigh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auswanderung und Emigranten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Émigration et émigrants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Emigration e emigrants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Emigrazione ed emigranti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αποδημία και μετανάστες</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This essay was published in the Magazine Feasta. It’s a great help to students to see this example of an essay of another student who is on a similar level to them.</string>
            <string language="es">Este ensayo se publicó en Feasta. Resulta de gran para los estudiantes ver este ejemplo de un ensayo de otro estudiante que tenga un nivel similar al de ellos.</string>
            <string language="ga">Foilsíodh an aiste seo san iris Feasta. Is cabhair mhór do dhálaí an sampla seo a fheiceáil de aistí dhaltaí eile atá ag an leibhéal chéanna.</string>
          </description>
          <language>ga</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Irish</string>
            <string language="es">Irlandés</string>
            <string language="ga">Gaeilge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Applied Writing</string>
            <string language="es">Escritura aplicada</string>
            <string language="ga">Scríobh Fheidhmeach</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
            <string language="es">Recurso adicional</string>
            <string language="ga">Additional Resource</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Versuch wurde in der Zeitschrift Feasta 
veröffentlicht. It?s eine große Hilfe zu den Kursteilnehmern, 
zum dieses Beispiels eines Versuchs eines anderen Kursteilnehmers zu 
sehen, der auf einer ähnlichen Stufe zu ihnen ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet essai a été édité dans le magasin Feasta.
It?s une grande aide aux étudiants pour voir cet exemple d'un 
essai d'un autre étudiant qui est à un niveau semblable à eux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este essay foi publicado no compartimento Feasta.
It?s uma ajuda grande aos estudantes para ver este exemplo de um
essay de um outro estudante que esteja em um nível similar a eles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo saggio è stato pubblicato nello scomparto
Feasta. It?s un aiuto grande agli allievi per vedere questo 
esempio di un saggio di un altro allievo che è ad un livello simile a
loro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το δοκίμιο δημοσιεύθηκε στο περιοδικό Feasta. 
It?s μεγάλες οδηγίες στους σπουδαστές για να 
δει αυτό το παράδειγμα ενός δοκίμιου ενός άλλου 
σπουδαστή που είναι σε ένα παρόμοιο επίπεδο σε τους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Irisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Angewandtes Schreiben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Irlandais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écriture Appliquée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Irish</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escrita Aplicada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Irlandese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scrittura Applicata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιρλανδικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εφαρμοσμένο γράψιμο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
